Today, we celebrate the 15th anniversary of the establishment of Dubai Internet City. We have witnessed major changes in the world of technology. Http://t.co/5UhV0KlY7A
Today we launched our new vision for Dubai Internet and Media City, which is based on innovation, because the real value is in new ideas and applications
We have allocated AED 4.5 billion to develop infrastructure, innovation complexes of 10 million square feet, financial funds to support innovators, incubators for creative and talented people
We will provide the world's smartest environment for innovators through quality projects. We want to be a global innovation center for the 2 billion people who live around us,
If we are to make a suitable place for us in the future among the nations and peoples, we must be contributors to the industry of change, not just those who follow it.
"The privilege to receive Premier Michel here, so soon after he took office. Nl and Belgium are not only good business partners, (1/2).

Millions of Americans still need to get health insurance—this is your chance to make an impact: http://t.co/nCjdfzik9v
Today we celebrated the 15th anniversary of founding Dubai Internet City. Since then, we have lived through a revolution in technology.
We launched a new vision for Internet City and Media City based on innovation, the most powerful tool to create the future.
We will invest AED 4.5bn to create 10m sq ft of innovation facilities, infrastructure, tech labs, smart buildings, plus financial funds.
We will become an innovation hub for the 2bn people living around us, mostly youths, by providing the smartest environment in the world.
If we want to shape our destiny, it is not enough to keep up with the pace of change. We must be the ones who make the change.
We're backing HS3 to connect some of our great Northern cities and create an economic powerhouse, with more jobs and opportunities.
